00123 namespace hdstl{
00124 namespace concepts{
00125 
00138     template <class HDS> 
00139     struct ForwardHDSConcept {
00140 
00143         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00144         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
00145         typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::forward_category forward_category;
00146 
00150         void constraints() {
00151             using namespace boost;
00152 
00153             function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00154             function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category,
00155             forward_traversal_tag> >();  
00156             const bool is_valid_storage_tag =
00157                     is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_source_tag>::value ||
00158                     is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_target_tag>::value ||
00159                     is_convertible<forward_category,next_in_facet_tag>::value;
00160             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( is_valid_storage_tag ); 
00161 
00162             const_constraints(hds);
00163         }
00164 
00168         void const_constraints(HDS const& hds){
00169             h = next_in_facet(hds,h);
00170             h = next_at_source(hds,h);
00171             h = next_at_target(hds,h);
00172         }
00173 
00174       private:
00178         ForwardHDS hds;        // a halfedge data structure object
00179         halfedge_descriptor h;  // a halfedge descriptor
00180         halfedge_descriptor g;  // another halfedge descriptor
00182     };
00183 
00184 }  // close namespace concepts
00185 }  // close namespace hdstl
